content: go birds c mon eagles fans root for the eagles and make a hat for all of your philadelphia eagles fan friends this hat uses worsted yarn and features colorwork in three colors for bold graphics size one size for adults gauge 22 0 sts = 4 inches 10 cm needles us 5 and us 6 us 6 double pointed needed for crown shaping yarn light worsted / dk less than one skein each of the following yarns color a cascade yarns ® 220 superwash® in white 871 50g color b cascade yarns ® 220 superwash® in silver grey 1946 7g color c cascade yarns ® 220 superwash® in myrtle heather 296 - 10g directions hat knit in the round using smaller needles and color a cast on 100 sts pm join to work in rounds rnds 1 12 k1 p1 repeat to end change to larger needles rnds 13-15 knit change to color b round 16 knit with color b round 17 knit with color c round 18 knit with color b rnds 19-21 knit with color a rnds 22-31 follow colorwork chart with colors a and c rnds 32-34 knit with color a round 35 knit with color b round 36 knit with color c round 37 knit with color b round 38 change to color a knit until hat is 6 25 inches from cast on on the last round place a stitch marker evert 10 stitches begin crown shaping round 1 knit to two stitches before the stitch marker k2tog sm round 2 knit repeat these two rounds until 10 stitches remain break yarn leaving approximately an 8 tail thread yarn onto yarn needle and pull through remaining stitches and draw up tightly fasten securely and weave in ends fly eagles fly 100999897969594939291908988878685848382818079787776757473727170696867666564636261605958575655545352515049484746454443424140393837363534333231302928272625242322212019181716151413121110 9 8 7 6 5 4 3 2 1 10 1 9 2 8 3 7 4 6 5 5 6 4 7 3 8 2 9 1c c 10
